Articles.Content:
Hey! Im new here, but have been playing KSP for like ever, I was wondering if anyone knows how to make an internal?

I need one for this....

and i am establishing a base on the island....

http://i1377.photobucket.com/albums/ah65/CorperalVasquez/screenshot243_zpsf525a8d8.png' alt='screenshot243_zpsf525a8d8.png'>

Any help would be appreciated...

Thanks

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM/KSCSM 8thBMTS Sulaco

I found this while searching around. It may be a good place to start.
